pv38:13.3: Addasa nigrodhaṃ ramaṇīyaṃ → rukkhaṃ nigrodhaṃ (s2, s3, mr)
pv38:29.4: niyatipariṇāmajaṃ → niyatipariṇāmajā (bj, pts2, mr) | nīyati pariṇāmajaṃ (s2, s3, pts1)
pv38:31.2: parassa → purisassa (s2, s3, mr), chindate → chindite (s2, pts1) | chinde (mr)
pv38:32.1: Acchejjābhejjo hi → acchejjabhejjo (bj, pts1-2) | acchejjo abhejjo (s2, s3) | acchejjabhejjo si (mr)
pv38:36.1: Cullāsīti → cūḷāsīti (bj, s2, s3, pts1-2, mr), mahākappino → mahākappuno (bj, pts2)
pv38:42.1: Vassāni satasahassāni → vassasatasahassāni (bj, s2, s3, pts1)
pv38:59.1: Ophuṇāmi → opuṇāmi (bj, pts2) | ophunāmi (s2, s3, mr) | odhunāmi (pts1) | opunāmi (?)
